TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Sierra_leone, title = Sierra_leone, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sierra_leone} }

S.FORM: Sierra Leone hya' ga cyux maki' tay 8 30 N, 11 30 W na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 71,740 sq km (maki' tay 119ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 71,620 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 120 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 6,018,888. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 56.20% , lhlahuy hya' ga 37.50%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 6.30%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Freetown. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 27 na tay spayat byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Ernest Bai Koroma, aring ryax 17 squ byacing tay 9 sa kawas 2007 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Sierra Leone hya' ga cyox maki' tay 8 30 N, 11 30 W na Xweco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 71,740 sq km (maki' tay 119ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 71,620 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 120 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 6,018,888. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 56.20% , lhlahoy hya' ga 37.50%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 6.30%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Freetown. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 27 na tay spayat byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Ernest Bai Koroma, aring ryax 17 sqo byacing tay 9 sa kawas 2007 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
